content.raw: Even more, the time of application of `*Cmd` and `*Reset` components is different. In fact, `*Cmd` components would result to the specified amount _after_ the physics step. Instead, `*Reset` components would be applied _before_. In this sense, I see a mismatch with the `JointForceCmd` \(that is applied before\). Again, as I wrote, the current implementation of `JointVelocityCmd` is quite singular and probably it would have deserved a different naming scheme. Though, I understand that right now it might be too late to be changed.
